summary: This document is an email from Ross Gow of ACUITY Reputation, sent on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, containing a statement denying allegations against her. It references claims involving Alan Dershowitz and criticizes the media for repeating what it calls defamatory stories.

persons.name: Ross Gow
persons.context: Sent the email containing a statement on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating he is handling her public communications.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The statement is issued on her behalf, denying allegations of an 'unsavoury nature' and defamatory claims appearing in the press.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Referenced as someone alleged by 'Ms' (likely a claimant) to be involved in having sexual relations with her, which he denies.

connections.description: Gow is sending a statement on behalf of Maxwell, acting as her representative from ACUITY Reputation.
Maxwell's statement references allegations linking Dershowitz to sexual relations with an accuser, connecting them in the context of the claims.

events.title: Issuance of Statement on Behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ross Gow sends an email containing a quotable statement denying allegations against Ghislaine Maxwell and referencing claims involving Alan Dershowitz.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell, through her representative, strongly denies allegations of an 'unsavoury nature' and calls them defamatory lies.
The statement claims the allegations are not new, have been fully responded to previously, and change each time they are retold.
The email specifically mentions that Alan Dershowitz is alleged to be involved in having sexual relations with an accuser, which he denies.
The document indicates Maxwell reserves the right to seek legal redress for the repetition of these claims.
